lexUnit.name: understand.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: perceive the significance, explanation, or cause of.

sentence.text: ` That 's right , " I said , pleased that he seemed to understand at last .

` How could a nation of beer-swiggers begin to understand the first thing about producing a half decent wine ? "

He understood things without having to be told .
Topaz understood their fear without sharing it .
